items.sentence: Anything you say can be used against you in court.
I suspect that Tom won\'t want to dance with Mary.
I suspected that Tom wouldn\'t be able to do that.
Tom decided to give Mary everything she asked for.
What happened to Tom could\'ve happened to anyone.
I don\'t think I should ask Tom to do that for us.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary recognized each other.
Tom says he doesn\'t blame Mary for what happened.
In his heart, Tom knew that he would never return.
I think I\'ll be able to do that faster on my own.
I thought it was a mistake to tell Tom the secret.
I thought that the bus was free, but I had to pay.
Tom took a picture of himself and sent it to Mary.
I couldn\'t believe Tom would really say no to me.
This is the last time I\'m telling you to do that.
Tom really wanted to believe what Mary was saying.
Tom remembers giving Mary the key to the suitcase.
Tom rolled up the string and put it in his pocket.
I hadn\'t planned to tell you anything about this.
This is a very interesting investment opportunity.
